body: i love these "why dont you scan it yourself" ive tried once to buy from a doujinshis from an artist i like that wasnt anywhere online. its feels impossible to buy doujinshi from a japanese artist when your not in the country.

全てのページに「low quality」を書くなら、読み難くなって画質が悪くなるんだよ。これより全てのページに「画質が悪い」が書かれない写真や本や漫画などの方が見易くて質がいいよ。だから何で「画質が悪い」って書いたのか？

You realise writing "low quality" on every page makes the quality worse, right? If anything, low quality pictures or manga are easier to look at than things like this where "low quality" is written everywhere.
Aw c'mon not the "low quality" in every fucking page
